FuncDef: This command configures how to construct the key for load-balancing RADIUS messages between RADIUS servers.
CLIs: load-balance-key vendor <vendor-id> [ <vendor-id> <...> <(> up to 5 max <)> ] attribute-type <attribute-type> [ attribute-type <...> <(> up to 5 max <)> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the RADIUS Vendor-Id. Values-0 to 16777215.
Specifies a RADIUS attribute that must be used to construct the key for load-balancing RADIUS messages between RADIUS servers. Values-1 to 255.
